chapter.text: “THERE'S A MONSTER!”^1500 You quickly explain.^1500 “Or some kind of large... guy?^1500 Thing?^1500 I'm not really sure...^1500 I think it’s been following me.^1500 I tried getting out through a window, and it tried to grab me I think it wants to KILL ME or something.”^1500 You explain how the windows have been locked, and the janitor takes a long sigh.
